reply_context.text: VLOPs are not allowed to prohibit eligible 40.12 researchers from scraping. If they could, Art. 40.12 would be totally toothless. The Commission has said TOS prohibitions on scraping violate 40.12 in three investigations now.

posts.text: I think under the DSA this would still count as publicly disseminated, but that seems weird to me since I also feel like theres probably an argument to be made that, as a rule, discord should broadly be treated as non public.

reply_context.text: 1) requires engaging an "invite link" for access, 2) the invite is public and processed automatically (i.e. the server is functionally open to the public) 3) the server rules include an express request not to scrape as a condition of engagement
